subject: fix: accessibility improvements, error feedback, PWA error handler
body:
Accessibility:
- Add aria-hidden="true" to all decorative SVGs (Header, TabBar,
  CollapsibleSection, SettingsPane, DetailPane, DropZone, FilterSidebar)
- Add aria-hidden="true" to overlay backdrop divs (FilterSidebar,
  SettingsPane, DetailPane) â€” keyboard users close via Escape key
- Make filter toggle aria-label dynamic to include active filter count

Error handling:
- Show user-visible error message when JSON file upload fails to parse
- Show message when non-JSON files are dropped
- Add .catch() to PWA visibility-change SW update check
